articles.author: Christopher Snowbeck
articles.title: New Minnesota data shows even wider racial gap in COVID-19 hospitalizations, deaths - Minneapolis Star Tribune
articles.description: New analysis shows a wide gap in death rates.
articles.content:
A new analysis shows a wider gap in Minnesota between the rates at which white residents and those in racial and ethnic minority groups have suffered from COVID-19.
For more than a month, state data… [+7594 chars]
